version_description: Improvements and bug fixes
Minor bugfixes

- Added a link on top of the Now Playing screen, making it easy for you to navigate to the content you are playing
- Fixed an issue with shuffle/un-shuffle
- Minor bugfixes

- You can now download your favorite tracks
- Playback Improvements
- Performance Improvements
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.

- Optimized for iPhone Xs Max
- Bugfixes
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.

- We’ve redesigned the artist and track radio feature, so it is now possible to navigate to the station before playing it
- Playback Improvements
- Performance Improvements
Introducing My Mix. Update your TIDAL app to listen to our new personalized playlists. My Mix is an easy way to enjoy more of the music you love.
Minor bugfixes.
Swipe down in My Collection to easily search your favorited albums, playlists, tracks, artists and videos.
Introducing the ability to mute artists and tracks. Blocking a track or artist will skip the currently playing content, and remove it from all radios and mixes immediately.
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.

- HiFi users can now access over 150,000 master-quality tracks – audio as flawless as it sounded in the mastering suite.
- CarPlay improvements
- Minor bug fixes
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
Discover the people behind the music with our new credits section at the artist page.
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
New Sharing Options: Share your favorite TIDAL content directly in your Facebook and Instagram Stories
Minor bugfixes.

- Minor bugfixes.
- TIDAL now speaks Bulgarian!
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.

Turn every ride into a road trip with TIDAL and Waze. Our new integration lets you start a Waze trip and see your directions right inside TIDAL. You can also browse TIDAL and control playback directly in Waze.
Minor bugfixes.
New Sharing Option: Share your favorite TIDAL content directly to your Snapchat stories.

New Feature: Introducing My Video Mix - a personalized curation of videos that offers an easy way to enjoy more of what you love. My Video Mix is personalized to your specific listening habits. No need to hunt through everything available to find something you might like.
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
We’ve introduced full-screen portrait mode video for a better mobile user experience, as well as implemented several bug fixes and general app improvements.
We’ve introduced full-screen mode video for a better mobile user experience, as well as implemented several bug fixes and general app improvements.
Minor bugfixes.
General bug fixes and app improvements
General bug fixes and app improvements
Introducing improved playlist sorting - listeners can now easily sort their playlist to their own preferences.
General bug fixes and app improvements
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
General bug fixes and app improvements.
Introducing an improved way to discover more of the music you love - now clickable module titles take you back to explore the source of your listening habits.
General bug fixes and app improvements
General bug fixes and app improvements
General bug fixes and app improvements

Introducing 10-second skips for videos: you can do that in portrait mode by double tapping on the now playing video or in landscape where you can choose to skip 10 seconds back/forward by pressing the new 10s icon.
You can now enjoy easy access to our TIDAL magazine articles on the Artist page - discover, learn, and share music industry news and insights.
Bug fixes

-New improved playlist editing: listeners can now use edit mode to seamlessly edit their playlists with drag and drop features, as well as easily edit playlist names and descriptions.
-New swipe left/right interactions on tracks.
-We’ve improved the search results page for a better search experience.
-New Explore section for clean content only.
-Sonos updates and improvements.
Minor bugfixes

• TIDAL Family is now available with In-App Subscriptions.
• Suggested Tracks can now be accessed via a new icon on the top right of the now playing screen.
• CarPlay improvements.
General bug fixes and app improvements
Bugfixes and optimisations for iOS 14.
General bug fixes and app improvements

Thank you for choosing TIDAL!  We're always improving your listening experience and updating our app regularly.  Keep your updates turned on and make sure you don't miss a thing.  
In this version:
-Introducing Feed: a collection of new music and content from the playlists and artists you follow will now live conveniently in one place for you to discover. 
-The new Genre Radio feature will help you discover new tracks and mix in your favorite songs.  You can access this new feature at the top of each genre page.  
-HiFi members can now choose to play Artist and Track Radio in Master Quality Audio, the highest possible resolution available. 
-Bug fixes and performance improvements

-Introducing Feed: a collection of new music and content from the playlists and artists you follow will now live conveniently in one place for you to discover.
-HiFi members can now choose to play Artist and Track Radio in Master Quality Audio, the highest possible resolution available.
-We've improved the search results page for a better search experience.
-Bug fixes and performance improvements

-We’ve improved our searching feature to bring you better results
-Have a favorite Mix? You can now save it and conveniently go back to it again
-Bug fixes and performance improvements

In this version:
-You can now download and listen to your mixes offline from anywhere. 
-We've fixed an issue some users faced with Google Chromecast. 
-We've fixed some bugs and made performance improvements.

In this version:
-Our app is now available in 3 additional languages: Croatian, Slovenian, and Serbian.
-You can now navigate song lists faster with our improved fast scroll feature. 
-We fixed bugs and made performance improvements.

Thank you for choosing TIDAL. We're constantly updating our app to elevate your listening experience. 

TIDAL is now available on Apple Watch. 
You can:
-Stream music and control playback of TIDAL directly on your Apple Watch, independent of your iPhone.
-Download all your favorite playlists and listen offline from anywhere without internet connectivity.

Thank you for choosing TIDAL! We’re always improving your listening experience and updating our app regularly. 

In this version:

TIDAL reintroduces TIDAL HiFi and launches TIDAL HiFi Plus. 

TIDAL Premium is now TIDAL HiFi:
-TIDAL Premium subscribers are upgraded to TIDAL HiFi at no extra cost.
-TIDAL HiFi includes music streaming in high-fidelity sound quality.
-TIDAL HiFi includes the new My Activity feature where subscribers can track and share their listening activity and share with friends via their mobile devices.

TIDAL HiFi is now named TIDAL HiFi Plus:
-TIDAL HiFi subscribers are upgraded to TIDAL HiFi Plus at no extra cost.
-TIDAL HiFi Plus is the only tier that includes all premium, immersive sound formats like Master Quality audio, Sony 360 Reality Audio, Dolby Atmos, and HiFi. 
-With TIDAL HiFi Plus, the new My Activity feature allows listeners to track and share their listening activity with friends via their mobile devices and see how their listening impacts artists. 
-It also includes Direct Artist Payouts, with as much as 10% of your subscription fee being directed to your most streamed artist.
 
We fixed bugs and made performance improvements.

Turn on your updates to make sure you don’t miss a thing!

Thank you for choosing TIDAL! We’re always improving your listening experience and updating our app regularly.
